mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (product_no, qna_title, qna_content, user_no, reg_date, qna_attachment) VALUES (#{productNo}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{userNo}, CURDATE(), #{qnaAttachment})
mapper.select: SELECT qp.qna_no, qp.product_no, qp.qna_title, qp.qna_content, u.user_name, u.id, qp.reg_date, qp.qna_attachment FROM user u, (SELECT qna.qna_no, qna.product_no, qna.qna_title, qna.qna_content, qna.user_no, qna.reg_date, qna.qna_attachment FROM qna LEFT JOIN product ON qna.product_no = product.product_no) qp WHERE qp.user_no = u.user_no AND qp.qna_no = #{ qnaNo }

SELECT qp.qna_no, qp.product_no, qp.qna_title, qp.qna_content, u.user_name, u.user_no, u.id, qp.reg_date, qp.qna_attachment FROM user u, (SELECT qna.qna_no, qna.product_no, qna.qna_title, qna.qna_content, qna.user_no, qna.reg_date, qna.qna_attachment FROM qna LEFT JOIN product ON qna.product_no = product.product_no) qp WHERE qp.user_no = u.user_no ORDER BY qp.qna_no DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET qna_title = #{qnaTitle}, qna_content = #{qnaContent}, qna_attachment = #{ qnaAttachment } WHERE qna_no = #{qnaNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM qna WHERE qna_no = #{ qnaNo }
